entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: Justin Finch-Fletchley is a person who is trying to disentangle himself from robes that have flown up over his head. He is mentioned as having a conversation with someone else.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who has had many goblines assassinated and is accused of using the Department of Mysteries to develop terrible poisons.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is trying to avoid being caught and punished by someone. He is checking his watch to see the time.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a person who is looking puzzled at Harry's conversation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is calling out to Harry from the other end of the room.

relationships.description: Fudge has had many goblines assassinated.
Harry needs to get back to his common room immediately or risk being caught and punished.
Hermione called out to Harry from the other end of the room.
Cho listened to Harry's conversation and looked puzzled.
